title: Consistent "disconnect from chat" errors
body:
Just curious as to whether other people were also experiencing frequent issues with connecting chat over the past week or two and what their fixes have been (if any), I've noticed a significant rise in the amount I disconnect from chat and stay disconnected. It's rather concerning and frustrating. 

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: I am getting them too, it used to  be fine i can chate wiht my friends still, now i can't even see who is only so ic ant play with them at all. Its making the game unplayable 4 me : (
